Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing pain. It's not uncommon to have some discomfort after back surgery. Have you been taking any pain medications or doing any physical therapy to help manage this?

responses.gpt4: I'm glad to hear that you're participating in physical therapy. It can be a very effective way to manage post-surgery pain and aid in your recovery. Going back to your overall health, do you use tobacco in any form, either smoking cigarettes or vaping?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear that you're doing physical therapy. It's an important part of recovery after back surgery. Now, I'd like to ask about your smoking habits. Do you currently smoke cigarettes or use any vaping devices?
